channel.title: links on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in links on Reflections

item.title: Bitcoins, new languages, freedom and other things
item.description: Some interesting links for the weekend: Mr.Krugman thinks Bitcoin is evil. Why should I turn off my devices for 30 mins, while a hunk of steel and glass is hurled into the upper atmosphere? #first-world-problems Lamdba expressions: something for the nerd in you. America, you make me want to travel! NOT REALLY! We don’t really change. Let’s not blame it on tech! Truth from Gary Vaynerchuk of winelibrary fame.
